auth_prompt: For more information, please, Sign In
banner_subtitle: Play the updated Volt with increased opportunities. Per one draw:

faq.f1-content:
• The promotion consists of 364 days of Daily Tournaments and Daily Prize Drops.
  • The promotion is divided into 1-week phases and runs from 22:01 every Wednesday until 21:59 the following Wednesday. Each week includes 7 daily tournaments and 7 daily prize drops.
  • Timing of a day starts at 22:01 and ends at 21:59.
  • Participation in the promotion is possible with the minimum bet of any participating slot game.
faq.f2-content:
• All verified “Leaderbet” players can participate in the promotion.
  • The company “Leaderbet” reserves the right to make any amendments to promotion rules or cancel the promotion any time and not give prior notice to its users regarding it.
  • “Leaderbet” reserves the right, in the event of technical bugs or on the grounds of other circumstances, at its discretion, to restrict its users from participating in the promotion, do not accrue any winnings, cancel accrued winnings without any explanation.
  • In case of any unfair act from the user or users’ team side, which is intended for getting gifts or other benefit, “Leaderbet” is entitled, at its sole discretion, to restrict its users from participating in the promotion, do not accrue any winnings, to cancel the accrued winnings without any explanations.
  • In case of any dispute, final decision taken by “Leaderbet” shall prevail.
faq.f3-content:
• In order to qualify, you need to make minimum one spin.
  • It is possible to win daily instant prize any time during a game, in a random manner.
  • The player can win only one prize per one spin.
  • Played and remaining prizes can be viewed in the window of the participating games.
  • A player may win multiple prizes during a day.
  • Daily prize drops will end daily upon 21:59, when the daily prize pool runs out of prizes for the day.
  • Prizes are awarded in the form of winning bet multiplier, freespins and bonuses:
  • 1. Daily prize will be awarded based on the multiplier of the winning bet. The maximum bet from which the multiplier will be calculated is 3 GEL. For example, if a player bets 5 GEL and wins with multiplier of 100X, he will receive 100 X 3 = 300 GEL.
  • 2. Freespins are awarded in the same slot and at the same level at which the player wone and is not subject to the multiplier rule. If the bet exceeds 3 GEL, the bet amount will automatically be equal to the maximum allowed bet – 3 GEL.
  • 3. Bonuses are awarded in the slot game - Wisdom of Athena™ and at the same level at which the player wins the prize. Bonuses are not subject to multiplier rules. If the bet exceeds 3 GEL, the bet amount will automatically be equal to the maximum allowed bet – 3 GEL.
  • Freespins and bonuses won are awarded on the same day and are valid for 7 days upon winning.
faq.f4-content:
• The player will receive points depending on the total win multiplier, which will be displayed on the leaderboard. Total win multiplier = Winning / Bet.
  • Daily limit of rounds - 5 000
  • Prizes will be distributed at the end of the daily tournament based on the final score recorded on the leaderboard.
  • Each winning amount will be transferred during 72 hours upon win.

board.daily-title: It is possible to win daily instant prize any time during a game, in a random manner.
board.friday-title: Appear in the weekly leaderboard depending on the total win multiplier Total win multiplier = Winning / Bet

prize-title: Everyday for 364 days, Up for Grabs 10 000 X Prizes
